sub_title: English teacher, multilingual, soft/hardware support windows/linux
summary:
I am a 51-year-old Dutchman. Between 2009 and August 2018 I taught English in Peru mainly to professional clients working for companies like Repsol and IBM. Most of my students were IT-engineers, financial managers, lawyers, but I have also worked with high schools (workshops). Due to personal circumstances I had to return to Holland, but I'm still active teaching English on-line and now and then I translate from Spanish to English or the other way around.

 I have been to Colombia, Venezuela, Ecuador, Chile, Brazil and Peru. I have a lot of experience In particular in Peru, and my Spanish is very good.

I have mainly taught English 'in-house' to top-notch professionals, 

Specialties: Teaching English/Dutch, also a professional level in Spanish (B2-C1) and workable knowledge of German (B1-B2). Moderate level in French and Portuguese. Beginners level in Italian and Russian.

IT: Setting up/Configuring Linux professionally in a home/small office environment. Vast experience with hundreds of desktop applications, Help desk, Documentation, Instruction
